Yago was a wizard who lived in the city of Baldurs Gate during the midâˆ’14 century DR.
He was an exceptionally vindictive and spiteful individual.
Yago wore a knaves robe and kept a personal spellbook that was filled the specifications of various curses.
He was married to the "witch" Brielbara.
Circa the , Yagos wife Brielbara had an affair with the adventurer named Coran. The two had a half-elven child called Namara. Yago cursed the baby and holed himself away at the Low Lantern gambling den in the Eastway district of Baldurs Gate.
